ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m an Erudite Wizard, and Gnoll was available to me for training at my guild at level 8 or 9 I believe, so that wouldn t be it. Ramagh, Level 14 Erudite
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 11 May 1999, Anubis wrote:
> Got an idea.
> Considering both of the people we know that have received Gnoll as a
> language are rangers, perhaps rangers get to know 'creature' languages,
> being that their focus would be animals and animalesque creatures.
> I wouldn't doubt that eventually they may learn Orc as well.

I'm an Erudite Wizard, and Gnoll was available to me for training at my
guild at level 8 or 9 I believe, so that wouldn't be it.

Ramagh, Level 14 Erudite Wizard, Fenin Ro.
